summary: Email correspondence between a contractor and an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York regarding the service of Epstein-related subpoenas. The AUSA requests that subpoenas be sent out with attached O8211 forms.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Requests that Epstein-related subpoenas be sent out and instructs to attach O8211 forms to each.

events.title: Subpoena Service Coordination
events.description: Email exchange regarding sending out Epstein-related subpoenas with attached O8211 forms.

locations: United States Attorney's Office Southern District of New York, One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The document is an email regarding the service of Epstein-related subpoenas.
An Assistant United States Attorney in the SDNY is coordinating the subpoena service.
The subpoenas require attachment of O8211 forms.
The communication indicates active legal proceedings in the Epstein case as of August 2019.
